Package gameOfLife_Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
gameOfLife_Controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements ActionListener
Class name: GameController Methods list: callSplash(),handleHelpClick(),handleRandomManual(ActionEvent e),handleExitItem(), handleNewItem(), handleCellClick(), handleSolutionItem(),handleRandomSet(), handleModelTextBox(), isValidBinary18BitNumber(String binaryString), handleStepsTextBox(), handleMultiColor(),actionPerformed(ActionEvent e), handleStartClick(),handleStopClick(),handleChangeLang(String lang),handleColorSet(), programNotAvailable(),updateUIComponents(),getLocalizedString(String key), loadXMLResource(String language) Constants list: currentLanguage, currentXMLDocument Purpose: This class manages user interactions, initiates the game, handles language changes, and controls game logic, including grid updates and color management

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameModel GameModel, GameView GameView)
      This constructor initializes a GameController with the provided GameModel and GameView.
      Parameters:
      GameModel - The GameModel instance for the game.
      GameView - The GameView instance for the game.

  • Method Details

    • callSplash

      public void callSplash()
      Name: callSplash() Purpose: Displays a splash screen and schedules its disposal. Algorithm:Displays the splash screen using the GameView's SplashScreen method and schedules a TimerTask to dispose of the splash screen after a delay.

    • handleHelpClick

      public void handleHelpClick()
      Name: handleHelpClick() Displays a help message when the help button is clicked.

    • handleRandomManual

      public void handleRandomManual(ActionEvent e)
      Name: handleRandomManual(ActionEvent e) Handles the actions for the "Random" and "Manual" buttons.
      Parameters:
      e - The action event generated by button clicks.

    • handleExitItem

      public void handleExitItem()
      Name: handleExitItem() Handles the action when the "Exit" menu item is selected. It disposes of the Game of Life frame, effectively closing the application.

    • handleNewItem

      public void handleNewItem()
      Name: handleNewItem() Handles the action when the "New" menu item is selected. It clears the grid, resetting all cells to their initial state.

    • handleSolutionItem

      public void handleSolutionItem()
      Name:handleSolutionItem() Handles the action when the "Solution" menu item is selected. It advances the game to the next generation using the specified mode (single or multicolor).

    • handleCellClick

      public void handleCellClick()
      Name: handleCellClick() Handles the action when a cell is clicked by the user. It allows the user to interact with individual cells by toggling their state.

    • handleRandomSet

      public void handleRandomSet()
      Name: handleRandomSet() Handles setting the grid cells to random states. Randomly sets a percentage of cells to the main color.

    • handleModelTextBox

      public void handleModelTextBox()
      Name: handleModelTextBox() Handles input in the model text box, validating and setting the GL rule. Gets the GL rule from the view, validates it as an 18-bit binary number, and sets it in the model if it's valid. Shows an error message if the input is invalid.

    • isValidBinary18BitNumber

      public static boolean isValidBinary18BitNumber(String binaryString)
      Name: isValidBinary18BitNumber(String binaryString) Validates a string to check if it represents a valid 18-bit binary number.
      Parameters:
      binaryString - The input string to be validated.
      Returns:
      True if the input is a valid 18-bit binary number, false otherwise.

    • handleStepsTextBox

      public void handleStepsTextBox()
      Name: handleStepsTextBox() Handles the input from the steps text box, validates it, and updates the number of steps in the game model.

    • handleMultiColor

      public void handleMultiColor()
      Name:handleMultiColor() Handles the multi-color feature by updating the colors of the cells based on their state and live neighbors.

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      Name: actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) Handles action events triggered by various components.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      e - The ActionEvent object representing the action event.

    • handleStartClick

      public void handleStartClick()
      Name: handleStartClick() Handles the click event on the "Start" button for running the Game of Life simulation.

    • handleStopClick

      public void handleStopClick()
      Name:handleStopClick() Purpose: Handles the click event on the "Stop" button, stopping the Game of Life simulation if it's running.

      public void handleColorSet()
      Name:handleColorSet() Purpose: Handles the color selection for the cells and updates the cell colors accordingly.

      public void programNotAvailable()
      Name:programNotAvailable() Purpose: Displays a message dialog to inform the user that the program is not available. This method is typically used when the program encounters unavailability or downtime.

    • updateUIComponents

      public void updateUIComponents()
      Name:updateUIComponents() Purpose: Updates various UI components with localized strings. This method is responsible for changing the text of UI components to match the selected language.
